column3: Let's see if gitian/pull tester agrees with this being deprecated :)\n

Automatic sanity-testing: FAILED BUILD/TEST, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/61032f894247f7a4158ec5b41067bcd7c3f35910 for binaries and test log.

This could happen for one of several reasons:
1. It chanages paths in makefile.linux-mingw or otherwise changes build scripts in a way that made them incompatible with the automated testing scripts (please tweak those patches in contrib/tes
@laanwj Seems that one is caused by @BitcoinPullTester ^^, I hope Matt can take a look.\n
@TheBlueMatt It's still not building it seems?\n
Yep, sorry...pull-tester is now undergoing upgrades to handle new dependencies for payment protocol...\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/61032f894247f7a4158ec5b41067bcd7c3f35910 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Maybe this is needed for MSVC? I really wonder why we added this...\n
I'm not aware of anyone doing MSVC builds recently. I'll take a look what commit added this.\nEdit: Damn ^^ https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/efdcf941742cb63b441656241d6699ac8d2819d3\n

This commit breaks cross-compiling Windows client from Linux:

```
i686-w64-mingw32-g++ -c -pipe -isystem /usr/i686-w64-mingw32/include/ -frandom-seed=qtbuild -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -msse2 -O2 -frtti -fexceptions -fdiagnostics-show-option -Wall -Wextra -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -Wstack-protector -DBOOST_THREAD_USE_LIB -DBOOST_THREAD_USE_LIB -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -DSCRYPT
